# sendDeviceSpecifics(to:using:messageID:)

**Instance Method**

Sends device specifics in response to a suggested action to send device specifics.

## Declaration

```swift
final func sendDeviceSpecifics(to destination: RCSHandle.URI, using cellularServiceID: CellularServiceID, messageID: RCSMessageID) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **destination**: The destination handle to send device specifics to.
- **cellularServiceID**: The service identifier to use for the message.
- **messageID**: The message identifier to use for the message.

## Discussion

Call this method after the person using the app selects a [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService/Business/Suggestion] of type [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService/Business/Suggestion/action(_:)], whose action type is [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService/Business/SuggestedAction/Action-swift.enum/sendDeviceSpecifics] .
